Welcome to Subtitler

Subtitler provides an powerful yet easy-to-use solution for Subtitling/Closed-Captions in Unity3D.

Asset Store Documentation Github Page


Plugin Features:

.SRT Import Support

Import timing and line data into Subtitler from external sources directly in Unity.

Unity Timeline Support

Add subtitles to your Timeline Cutscenes using the new Subtitler Track.

Culling & Tracking

Subtitles played can be automatically culled when unhearable or out of range. Visible subtitle lines can also be forcibly removed by their id using API.

(Optional) Localization

Features native support for Unity Localization, even for Timeline clips.

API

Subtitler operates on interfaces, making it easy to integrate with custom systems.

Powered by UIToolkit

Subtitler uses Unity UIToolkit to provide smooth animations and layouting. This allows you to easily theme or modify subtitler UI.

(Your project does not need to utilize UIToolkit for its UI. Subtitler can operate standalone in its own 'Canvas'-like GameObject and fully respects UGUI sorting layers).

Documentation & Commented Source Code Provided

Subtitler comes with a online Manual & API Documentation. Feel free to browse it before buying to get familiar with the workflow.

And more!

Rich Text Support, UI Options (Alignment, background panel visibility, Font size), Trigger events on play, Editor Subtitle Authoring tool...
